I would love to know how your implementation improves upon the one that Microsoft already provides.

I was just researching the new studio feature when i found this project. One difference off the bat - you can make this tool generate PascalCase (required by our C# coding standards) and it will add JsonProperty attributes mapping to the capitalization used in the json. In source code i also see a stub for creating Java classes. Having that fleshed out would be really useful for where I work
